Promotion is taken seriously at EPAM and requires a methodical approach that aligns the Resource Manager and their employee. Resource Managers are required to work with their employees to make sure they have a thorough understanding of the Global Competency Framework and that they have methodically demonstrated their preparedness for Assessment and in turn, promotion.
